content: With the Valley of Ecstasy officially cleared of threats, you can now begin to explore the final region of **New Thunderclap Temple**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road' and the sub-subsection 'Completing the Pagoda Prisoner's Quest'.
The content is as follows:
With the Valley of Ecstasy officially cleared of threats, you can now begin to explore the final region of **New Thunderclap Temple**.
